name: Sonia Ferrell
what_you_do: Sonia Miller is an Empowerment Coach and Energy Healing Practitioner who helps professional women unlock their purpose, passion, potential, and prosperity without wasting time or working harder.
who_you_serve: Sonia serves professional women, including C-suite executives, physicians, attorneys, salespeople, educators, health service providers, social justice activists, artists, and women in various fields such as tech, engineering, real estate, construction, education, and law enforcement.
bio: Sonia has 30 years of training and experience, holds advanced degrees in Business and Social Work, and has received extensive training in mental health, spirituality, energy psychology, and holistic health modalities.
business_focus: Sonia Miller is an Empowerment Coach and Energy Healing Practitioner who helps professional women unlock their purpose, passion, potential, and prosperity without wasting time or working harder. (empowerment coaching)
